fixes.name: Selected Year Filter
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR SelectedYear = SELECTEDVALUE('Select Year'[Display As])
RETURN YEAR('accounts+'[TransactionDate]) = SelectedYear
fixes.solution_explanation: Replaced YEAR([TransactionDate]) with YEAR('accounts+'[TransactionDate]) and converted the Tableau parameter [Parameters].[Select Year] to SELECTEDVALUE('Select Year'[Display As]). The expression returns a boolean comparing the transaction year to the selected parameter value.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The formula references a Tableau parameter ([Parameters].[Select Year]); per rules, any calculation using parameters must be implemented as a measure.
